desc: Perfecting the firing cadence of laser weaponry is a task that could keep the engineering elite of any given planet busy for centuries.
name: Focusing Arrays

desc: New developments in tech cooling regularly surface, improving the stability and efficiency of our weapons systems, keeping them from blowing up the ships upon which they are mounted.
name: Flash Coolant

desc: As our fleets roam every further from our ancestral home, our sensor technology continuously pushes past the limits of old.
name: Planetary Signal Boosters

desc: Increasingly powerful computation paradigms allow us to adapt individual construction projects to planetary and ultra-local gravitational conditions.
name: Gravitational Analysis

desc: The application of game and puzzle theory has the potential to greatly optimize modular assembly and construction.
name: Assembly Algorithms

desc: Neutronium is a super-dense substance composed of neutrons that can be forged into extremely resistant and durable armor.
name: Neutronium Extraction

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Research Leader (Physics):

desc: This exotic substance has many properties that seemingly defy the laws of physics. Harvestable concentrations can only be found near Black Holes or in certain nebulas.

(×2)  Number of years since game start is greater than 110
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Physics):
    •   Is Field Manipulation Expert
desc: While much of our technological advancement has been focused on the conversion of matter into energy, our scientists are beginning to realise that the efficient conversion of energy back into certain forms of matter has many interesting applications, most notably in the field of deep space combat operations where logistical support might not always be possible.
name: Theory : Energy-Matter Reconstruction

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Number of years since game start is greater than 110
(×2)  Number of years since game start is greater than 115
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Engineering):
    •   Is Field Manipulation Expert
desc: The ability to layer our forcefield projections without interference will allow us to massively amplify the maximum theoretical integrity of shields, though at a small cost in shield recharge rates. Unfortunately, the size and power consumption of the forcefield projectors limits the use of this technology to only the largest vessels.
name: Theory : Layered Shielding

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Number of years since game start is greater than 120
(×2)  Number of years since game start is greater than 125
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Physics):
    •   Is Materials Expert
desc:
Advancements in scanning technology has revealed that the unidentified organic matter used in the construction of the Black Hole Containment Vessel exists in multiple dimensions separate from our those commonly utilised by our current technologies.

This discovery represents a divergent path of research that could fundamentaly change our understanding of reality and the laws that govern it. Further research is advised.
name: Organic Matter: Structure Analysis

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Number of years since game start is greater than 120
(×2)  Number of years since game start is greater than 125
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Physics):
    •   Is Field Manipulation Expert
desc:
As we begin to unravel the mysteries of organic matter, we have discovered that it grows by feeding on exotic energy in higher dimensions. Unfortunately, the creation of these particles in sufficiently large quantities is proving extremely difficult.

More research is required to construct a formal theory for the laws governmening both the growth mechanism and particle creation.
name: Theory : Organic Growth Manipulation

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Number of years since game start is greater than 125
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Physics):
    •   Is Particles Expert
desc:
I know the evil of my ancestors because I am those people. The balance is delicate in the extreme. I know that few of you who read my words have ever thought about your ancestors this way.

It has not occurred to you that your ancestors were survivors and that the survival itself sometimes involved savage decisions, a kind of wanton brutality which civilized humankind works very hard to suppress.

What price will you pay for that suppression? Will you accept your won extinction?

-The Stolen Journals

The Spear of Cassius is an anti-fleet doomsday weapon deployed by the Ragnarok that inflicts massive damage to ships within its destruction radius. It has to be recharged after each use by consuming planets. More details can be found in the associated event chain in the Situation Log once the weapon has been used.
name: Doomsday Weapon : Spear of Cassius

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Number of years since game start is greater than 100
(×2)  Number of years since game start is greater than 105
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Physics):
    •   Is Field Manipulation Expert
desc: By applying stellar manipulation techniques to a small quantity of extremely dense materials, we are able to create an artificial singularity and maintain it through a constant supply of matter. Further research is required to refine the process and explore practical applications.
name: Theory : Artificial Black Holes

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Number of years since game start is greater than 95
(×2)  Number of years since game start is greater than 100
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Physics):
    •   Is Field Manipulation Expert
desc:
A semi-organic vessel that should, in theory, be capable of creating and containing an artificial black hole. Created from unidentifiable organic matter found in the ruins of an ancient civilisation, this vessel can contain and supress the space-time effects of a black hole of any size.

This allows us to continuously feed the black hole matter that it converts into energy, and more importantly, theoretically draw out the stored energy at any time in almost limitless quantities.
name: Theory : Black Hole Containment Vessel

weight_modifiers:
(×1.5)  Number of years since game start is greater than 115
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Physics):
    •   Is Particles Expert
desc:
Here lies a toppled god-
His fall was not a small one.
We did but build his pedestal,
A narrow and a tall one.

Through Localised Reality manipulation, we are able to introduce a small, temporary flaw in the Black Hole Containment Vessel. This flaw can be manipulated to channel the flow of energy from the black hole without a medium, in effect allowing us to control the release of incredible amounts of energy - powerful enough to pierce through the core of a planet.
name: Doomsday Weapon : Spear of Longinus

By releasing bio-engineered nano-particles into the atmosphere of the planet, we are able to subtly influence the thoughts of its population, making them more susceptible to external influences and reducing their happiness.

You may select this weapon through the empire policy screen and authorise its use under empire edicts.

effects: Unlocks Titan doomsday weapons research chain
weight_modifiers:
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Society):
    •   Is Biology Expert
desc:
A modified strain of the Evolutionary Virus delivered and controlled via nanites. Through this delivery mechanism, we are able to engineer mutations within the enemy's population, greatly increasing their physical strength and aggressiveness, turning them into ferocious xenomorphs under our control. While most of the infected will not survive the mutation process, those that do turn into a horrific, rampaging force. This is an extremely energy intensive process.

You may select this weapon through the empire policy screen and authorise its use under empire edicts.
name: Doomsday Weapon : Primal Mutation

desc: Compressing suitable materials into ultra-dense forms is a cheap and efficient way to improve their ability to absorb weapons-grade impacts.
name: Matter Compression

desc: With the chemical reaction tightly controlled by missile-board microprocessors, warhead detonations can be tuned for maximum effect for local conditions at the time of impact.
name: Thermodynamic Yield Control

desc: Advances in miniaturization allow for more rapid loading and discharging of rocket-propelled payloads.
name: Miniaturized Pre-Igniters

desc: Ultra-dense slugs can punch through even the strongest of projected shields.
name: High-Density Munitions

desc: Minor technical advances combine with improved shipboard routines for handling munitions to provide a noticeable boost in fire rate.
name: Loader Efficiency

desc: Increasing the speed at which fighter pilots can process and act upon enemy positioning data elevates strike craft a few steps up the food chain.
name: Synapse Interceptors

desc: Circulating excess heat from weapons discharge in order to prime munitions as they are loaded increases the rate of fire of strike craft weaponry.
name: Heat Recyclers

desc:
A massive super-carrier that is basically a mobile shipyard that manufactures and launches fully-autonomous combat drones during engagements. Able to directly convert energy into the raw materials required for drone construction, the Erebus can construct and launch 10 drones every 25 days. The constant supply of reinforcements makes the Erebus an incredibly valuable asset in massive fleet battles. Due to the size and complexity of the drone manufactory, the Erebus relies heavily on extremely powerful shields for defence.

Combat Drones created by the Erebus carry enough power to sustain them for 90 days, after which they will automatically self-destruct.
name: Erebus

The world is for the living. Who are they?
We dared the dark to reach the white and warm.
She was the wind when the wind was in my way;
Alive at noon, I perished in her form.
Who rise from the flesh to spirit know the fall:
The word outleaps the world and light is all.

-Theodore Roethke

desc: The organic matter has been analysed and dated to be older than the age of our galaxy. Therefore, it must have extra-galactic origins. It is definitely artificial, but represents a branch of technology from a completely alien root that is far removed from our own, making understanding and replication difficult at best. Nonetheless, it warrants further research.
name: Framework : Organic Technology

desc: The organic matter we currently possess appears to be the basis for some sort of core - the central governing mass from which other structures will grow. Our scientists believe this core was originally part of a massive, spacefaring entity and which was destroyed eons ago. That the core matter survived and remained dormant but alive for so long is a testament to the resilience of organic technology.
name: Organic Core

desc:
A fully autonomous ship built around a doomsday weapon, designed to transport the massive system to its target. By utilising dimensional phasing and specially modified phase shields, this weapon can survive inside the core of a main sequence star just long to make a localised alteration of the laws of physics and trigger a nova.

The Sun Crusher will nova the system's sun, destroying all colonies and ships in the system, and turn all planets uninhabitable.

Instructions for how to activate this weapon can be found in the associated authorisation edict.
name: Doomsday Weapon : Sun Crusher

desc:

You may select this weapon through the empire policy screen and authorise its use under empire edicts.
name: Doomsday Weapon : Neutronium Kinetic Bombardment

effects: Unlocks Titan doomsday weapons research chain
desc: The creation of fully autonomous machines that will self-replicate is achievevable by our current technology. However, these machines may prove extremely dangerous without the proper safeguards and failsafes. This framework will enable the safe creation of such machines.
name: Framework : Von Neumann Machines

effects: Unlocks Titan doomsday weapons research chain
desc:
Once released on the planet, these self-replicating machines will spread and consume all matter (both organic and inorganic) that match its pre-programmed patterns until instructed otherwise by the controlling AI. Excess matter not used in its replication process is deposited for collection as energy and minerals.

You may select this weapon through the empire policy screen and authorise its use under empire edicts.
name: Doomsday Weapon : Nanite Disassemblers

effects: Unlocks Titan doomsday weapons research chain
desc:
Through direct and prolonged exposure to concentrated quantities of Mind Control Stimulants delivered through nanites, we are able to rewrite the enemy population's memories and identity, making them believe they are citizens of our Empire. This allows us to assimilate them into our society. The process is extremely costly and time-consuming.

You may select this weapon through the empire policy screen and authorise its use under empire edicts.
name: Doomsday Weapon : Forced Assimilation
